actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Science Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the American River, Calif., for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates a specified portion of the American River, California, for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968. (Adds 16 U.S.C. 1276 (a) (28)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Science Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the American River, Calif., for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
